channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Black refuse bags left on pavement, 11th June
item.description:
This pile of black refuse bags of building waste has been left outside the property (Leontine Close) for several months and is attracting more rubbish. It needs to be cleared to avoid it getting worse.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 80, Furley Road, Peckham, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Flies swamming over rubbish in skip, 11th June
item.description:
This skip is full of bin bags and a visible box with bananas! It has attracted so many flies and myself and my neighbours are experiencing so many flies from this! Please help

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Kingsland Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Lynton road near 19 and 21, 11th June
item.description:

item.title: Littering weeds generally an eyesore, 11th June
item.description:
Generally an eyesore along this extremely busy stretch . Never cleaned / rubbish leaves filling gutters / weeds / people dumping litter .This needs regular cleaning Why is the other side washed / weed free/ cleaned yet this side never ?

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Evering Road, Hackney, London

item.title: Pot holes and defects, 11th June
item.description:
From outside number 11 to 15 there are many pot holes and defects that need to be repaired asap. One pot hole is so deep someone car or even a person will injure themselves or damage their car. The whole are has pot holes of various sizes. The whole road could be repaired.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 16, Millfields Cottages, Poverest, London

item.title: Large furniture left close to my fense, 11th June
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hutchins Road, Thamesmead, London

item.title: Obstructing the pavement, 11th June
item.description:
The works at 78 Kyverdale Road have blocked the pavement without a licence. This is a busy residential street with many families and buggies passing. Pedestrians are now forced to cross the road, but no safe crossing has been arranged, and signage is mini
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Kyverdale Road, Hackney, London

item.title: Fly tipped chair and rubbish, 11th June
item.description:

item.title: Abandoned clamped Ford Transit van - HF67 ZRT, 11th June
item.description:
This blue transit van with parking tickets and a clamp has been abandoned since April 2025 - over 2 months. It has not moved since and parked very badly to hedge. Full of rubbish inside. Bexley council please arrange for this van to be towed and removed please. There is a notice stuck to driver's window also.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Olyffe Avenue, East Wickham, London
Report on FixMyStreet
